page.title: 02Northwood Agricultural Show.
page.content: Every year the agricultural show is held in the show field.They have animals there.Inside the tents they have small animals like rabbits,billy goats and sheep,but the bigger animals such as cows and bulls are tethered outside.Cups and prizes are given for the best animals. Refreshments are sold,candy floss and cups of tea at 20p.Little children can have pony and donkey rides.There are games like hoop_la and coconut shy.You have to knock the coconut down and you win a coconut or a football. Agricultural machinery such as tractors and trailers are demonstrated and for sale. The show is popular with the farming community and with holiday makers.
